note.p: Musson included a handwritten transcription of M’s letter in an application that he lodged on 17 May 1893 for the position of Curator of the Sydney Botanic Garden, which he had heard was about to become vacant.

div.p: Your tendencies moreover are so practical, and you are so accustomed to bush travels, that whatever will devolve on you, is sure to be resultfully carried out.
Wishing you the best success in your career,
